changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE periodic ( uuid UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULl, payment_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, recurrence_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(15, 6) NOT NULL, day_of_month INT NOT NULL, month VARCHAR(9) NOT NULL, account_debited_uuid UUID NOT NULL, account_credited_uuid UUID NOT NULL, contact_uuid UUID NOT NULL, comment VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created BIGINT NOT NULL, modified BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT periodic_debited_fk FOREIGN KEY (account_debited_uuid) REFERENCES account (uuid) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT periodic_credited_fk FOREIGN KEY (account_credited_uuid) REFERENCES account (uuid) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT, CONSTRAINT periodic_contact_fk FOREIGN KEY (contact_uuid) REFERENCES contact (uuid) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT )
